mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project_work order by id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_work ( id, projectid, projectuserid, title, state, priority, type, finishdate, deadline, regdate, content ) VALUES ( Project_Work_id_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{projectId}, #{projectUserId}, #{title}, #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority}, #{type}, null, #{deadLine}, SYSDATE, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update project_work set title=?,content=?,state=?,priority=?, deadLine=? where id =${value}
